-- test: raw endpoint basic access --
-- command --
kubectl-actuator --pod {{pod}} raw /health
-- expect --
"status"


-- test: raw endpoint non-existent --
-- command --
kubectl-actuator --pod {{pod}} raw /nonexistent
-- expect --
"error":


-- test: raw endpoint without slash prefix --
-- command --
kubectl-actuator --pod {{pod}} raw health
-- expect --
"status"


-- test: raw multi-pod --
-- command --
kubectl-actuator --pod {{pod[0]}} --pod {{pod[1]}} raw /health
-- expect --
"pods":
-- expect --
"status"
